entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
